titles.title: Agricultural Irrigation and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993

A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require producers of an agricultural commodity for which an acreage limitation program is in effect to pay certain costs as a condition of agricultural loans, purchases, and payments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13835-13836)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 10/18/1993--Introduced. Agricultural Irrigation and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require producers under an acreage limitation program to pay certain irrigation costs.
